issues: Import added but initialization code not executed
Missing actual i18n initialization call in render sequence

patterns_discovered.description: Added import statement without corresponding initialization logic
patterns_discovered.context: i18next import added but the initialization function is never called before React renders

patterns_discovered.description: Task requirement not fully met across multiple attempts
patterns_discovered.context: Five sessions attempted without achieving functional i18next initialization

patterns_discovered.description: No consideration for async initialization requirements
patterns_discovered.context: i18n typically requires asynchronous initialization before rendering, but no async pattern implemented

gotchas_discovered.explanation: Simply importing the i18n config file doesn't execute its initialization logic; requires explicit function call or promise handling
gotchas_discovered.impact: i18next remains uninitialized, translations unavailable to app

gotchas_discovered.explanation: i18n initialization must complete before components render and attempt to use translations
gotchas_discovered.impact: Missing initialization causes translation keys to display instead of translated text

gotchas_discovered.explanation: i18next async initialization may conflict with StrictMode's double-mounting in development
gotchas_discovered.impact: Potential race conditions or incomplete initialization state

approach_outcome.reason: Partial implementation - import added but i18n never actually initialized before app render
approach_outcome.root_cause: Missing execution of i18n initialization function and no async pattern to ensure initialization completes before React renders
approach_outcome.what_worked: Import statement syntax correct and path accurate
approach_outcome.what_failed: No actual i18n initialization call made; requirement for initialization before app renders not fulfilled

recommendations.recommendation: Add i18n.init() or similar initialization call
recommendations.implementation: Call i18n initialization function after import, likely as: await i18n.init() before createRoot() render
Wrap ReactDOM.createRoot().render() in a then() block or use async IIFE to ensure i18n initialization completes first

recommendations.recommendation: Verify i18n config exports initialization function
recommendations.implementation: Check frontend/src/i18n/config to confirm it exports an init() function or similar hook

recommendations.recommendation: Add error handling for i18n initialization
recommendations.implementation: Include try-catch or promise rejection handling for i18n initialization failures
Add comments explaining why i18n must be initialized before app render to prevent future misunderstandings
